level.heading: REQUESTS FOR PROPOSALS IN THE SET-ASIDE MARKET (ยง 27-1605)

level.text: Before the contracting officer restricts a CSP procurement to the small business set-aside market, the contracting officer shall determine that:

There is a reasonable expectation that proposals will be obtained from at least two (2) responsible small business enterprises certified by the Department of Small and Local Business Development (DSLBD); and
An award will be made at reasonable prices.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 35 DCR 1448 (February 26, 1988); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 1136 (February 1, 2013).
